Package comp3111.webscraper

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that manage GUI interaction. Please see document about JavaFX for details.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Controller.BarChart_BarDBClick_Handler
      BarChart Double Click Event Handler Inner Class When bar is double clicked - Its color will be changed - bar_smVector will update to indicate it has been clicked - update textAreaConsole
      class  Controller.BarChart_BarEntered_Handler
      BarChart onEntered Event Handler Inner Class When mouse is entered to a bar - the color will be changed
      class  Controller.BarChart_BarExited_Handler
      BarChart onExited Event Handler Inner Class When mouse is exited from a bar - reset color to original one
      static class  Controller.DataModel
      DataModel for Barchart histogram/ TableView
      class  Controller.github_EventHandler
      hyperlink onclick handler link to member's github page
      class  Controller.HyperlinkCell
      Table view hyperlink cell callback class Hyperlink Column require it to work
      class  Controller.SearchAsyncTask
      Scaping portal with async Call the function to update summary and table

      • DateCompare

        public int DateCompare​(java.lang.String a,
                       java.lang.String b)
                throws com.gargoylesoftware.css.parser.javacc.ParseException,
                       java.text.ParseException
        Comparing the data
        Parameters:
        a - - First date string
        b - - Second date string
        Returns:
        0, 1, -1, representing the comparison result
        Throws:
        com.gargoylesoftware.css.parser.javacc.ParseException - cannot parse the date string to date obj
        java.text.ParseException - cannot parse the date string to date obj

      • actionLastSearch

        private void actionLastSearch()
        Called when the new button is pressed. Very dummy action - print something in the command prompt. actionNew() actually is LastSearchAction The result will revert to the last Search

      • actionRefine

        private void actionRefine()
        Task 5 Refine Search function Only extract the the data with certain keyword, title field(handle locally), Refined result will NOT save as a search record LastSearch/Current can refine one time only

      • closeAndResetAll

        public void closeAndResetAll()
        Handle close button (Task 6.iii) 0. close webClient connection 1. clear console 2. clear search bar keyword 3. clear summary 4. clear tableView items 5. clear distribution 6. clear trend 7. refine button 8. clear all search record
